```{r echo=FALSE}
library(modeltime)
library(tseries)
library(seastests)
library(tidyverse)
library(timetk)
```

# Leitura dos dados

```{r echo=TRUE}
data <- readr::read_csv(
  "train.csv"
  ) |> 
  group_by(date) |> 
  summarise(sales = mean(sales)) |> 
  filter(year(date) == 2016)
```

##

```{r echo=TRUE}
data |> 
  plot_time_series(
    date, 
    sales,
    .interactive = TRUE
    )
```

##

```{r echo=TRUE}
data |> 
  plot_acf_diagnostics(
    date,
    sales,
    .interactive = TRUE
  )
```
